skills.name: Hard Skills

computer.name: My PC
computer.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX750 / AMD Radeon RX580

worked: * Led a development team of 3 members (2 frontend and 1 backend) as team lead, including task allocation and process management.
* Developed and optimized backend services, ensuring high performance and scalability.
* Supported frontend developers in implementing business logic on React and optimizing client-server interactions.
* Integrated with a payment gateway to ensure secure and reliable transactions.
* Set up CI/CD pipelines for automated deployment to production, reducing time-to-market.
* Designed and developed a high-load backend to support complex game scenarios and interactions in the Telegram WebApp.
* Optimized PostgreSQL database performance, implemented indexing, and created complex queries to minimize latency.
* Set up and maintained a caching system with Redis to reduce load and improve application response speed.
* Integrated with the Telegram API.
* Implemented CI/CD pipelines in Gitlab, streamlining the production deployment process.
* Developed and integrated new modules to expand CRM capabilities.
* Debugged and enhanced system stability.
* Integrated with Kubernetes for scalability and container management.
* Wrote tests using Jest to improve code reliability.
* Optimized legacy code: refactoring and enhancing performance.
* Designed the database structure for optimal application performance.
* Developed APIs to enable smooth interaction across system components.
* Worked with microservices for increased flexibility and scalability.
* Configured CI/CD processes to automate build and deployment.
* Identified and resolved bugs to improve product quality.
* Developed and maintained the website.
* Created internal applications to support business operations.

data.details: Provided technical maintenance and support for over five computer systems.
Handled technical maintenance and support for two computer systems.

data.position: Business Owner (Auto Parts Store / Yandex.Taxi Franchise)
data.details: Built and developed a business from scratch to successful completion. Gained knowledge in accounting, business management, and familiarized with key aspects of Russian tax and labor law.
Gained experience in selling network provider products, including internet services, cable TV, and TV boxes. Completed professional training in cold sales techniques.

driver.name: Driver's License
driver.value: Currently learning to obtain category 'B' license.

free.name: Hobbies and Interests
free.value: Studying professional literature and developing several pet projects from scratch. I also explore various fields, which constantly motivates me to learn and grow.
